tool_description: Parses raw DNA data files from various testing companies (23andMe, AncestryDNA, MyHeritage, etc.) and extracts SNP information into a standardized format.

file_path.description: Path to the raw DNA data file

company_format.description: Testing company format: 23andme, ancestry, myheritage, ftdna, gedmatch

output_format.description: Output format: standard, vcf, or plink

error_messages: File not found: Verify the file path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported company format: Use one of [23andme, ancestry, myheritage, ftdna, gedmatch].
Invalid file format: Ensure the file matches the specified company format.
Corrupted data: The file contains malformed or incomplete genetic data.
Empty file: The provided file contains no readable genetic data.
usage: Provide the file_path to your raw DNA data and specify the company_format. Optionally set output_format for different downstream tools.

snp_count.description: Total number of SNPs parsed from the file

chromosomes_found.description: List of chromosomes present in the data
